Class Circle

java.lang.Object
Shapes.Circle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
public class Circle extends Object implements Shape
Represents a circle shape with center coordinates, radius, and fill color.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Circle(String line)
    Constructs a Circle from an SVG element string.
    Circle(String[] params)
    Constructs a Circle from command arguments.

    • toSVGFormat

      public String toSVGFormat()
      Returns the SVG representation of this circle as a string.
      Specified by:
      toSVGFormat in interface Shape
      Returns:
      the SVG format string of this circle

    • translate

      public void translate(int dx, int dy)
      Translates the circle's position by the given deltas. The circle's center is moved by (dx, dy), but will not move closer to the origin than its radius.
      Specified by:
      translate in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      dx - the delta to translate on the x-axis
      dy - the delta to translate on the y-axis

    • within

      public boolean within(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Determines if the circle lies completely within the rectangular area defined by (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
      Specified by:
      within in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      x1 - the minimum x-coordinate of the area
      y1 - the minimum y-coordinate of the area
      x2 - the maximum x-coordinate of the area
      y2 - the maximum y-coordinate of the area
      Returns:
      true if the circle is completely within the area, false otherwise
